short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a livestream preview to the YouTube channel live tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Preview YouTube livestreams on the "Live" tab of channels!

YouTube Streams + automatically starts a live preview of a channel's currently ongoing livestream on the users channel.

Here's all of the currently available features:
 • Watch a livestream from the "Live" tab of any YouTube channel
 • Chat in scheduled stream chats (effectively operating as an offline chat)

* This is mostly a passion project, so I will add features as (if) I come up with them.
